decisions.what: OTP Launch to have FF turn on in W02, everything ready by EOY
decisions.context: Evaluated multiple launch options (W50, W51 at 90%, W51 at 10%, W02). Chose W02 launch to 90% of users as less risky with devs available for support, still before peak, won't break Factor/FF. Rejected earlier launches due to developer availability during holidays and risk factors.

action_items.task: Send draft markdown document for TPT app to Prateek, Maria, Ahmed, and DA for estimation of V0 and V1 features
Onboard on app initiative and learn domains alongside Maria without worrying about project division
Get back to Nikita with recommendations on project focus after onboarding

decisions.what: Active participation meetings should occur in private spaces (phone booths/meeting rooms), while passive listening is acceptable at desk
decisions.context: Discussion of in-office meeting etiquette and shift from pre-remote work practices

decisions.what: App initiative is a broad onboarding opportunity for Prateek to understand multiple domains before narrowing focus
decisions.context: Prateek asked about focus area (growth vs retention); Nikita clarified the intent is cross-domain knowledge to avoid siloing

decisions.what: Both Prateek and Maria need to know each other's domains to provide backup support
decisions.context: Avoiding situation where someone is too focused on their domain to help if something happens on the other side

feedback: Nikita explained product management hierarchy: Principal is director-level IC, working on HelloFresh group-wide initiatives (example: Leo working on cross-selling)
Prateek assigned to app initiative due to extra capacity and as good opportunity to get into multiple topics

blockers.issue: Short experimentation windows impractical due to customer volume concerns
Difficulty accelerating experimentation without synthetic traffic; experimentation teams resistant to synthetic traffic idea

key_topics: Context-driven product management document and transition strategy
Shortening discovery and scoping work using AI
TPT app initiative and team onboarding
Product management hierarchy and career levels

action_items.task: Open mid-level designer position for Good Chop replacement
Coach Mega on stakeholder management
Bundle design critiques for New Ventures and Shopping together
Involve Nikita Gorshkov or Daniel in hiring interviews for mid-level role
Ping Shay to demo and address Factor Form UX issues
Complete UX audit for Factor Form
Connect Yumi and Michael in conversation about Factor Form UX

decisions.what: Hire mid-level designer instead of senior for Good Chop position
decisions.context: Allows for long-term growth and avoids cycle of quickly hiring and losing momentum with senior roles; team already has strong seniority

decisions.what: Bundle design critiques for New Ventures and Shopping
decisions.context: To promote knowledge transfer between system-focused HelloFresh side and explorative New Ventures side, creating healthy friction

decisions.what: Factor Form strategy: integrate into Factor if Shopify store fails
decisions.context: Concerns over VMS Shopify store's templated design and lack of ownership

decisions.what: Leverage Michael's experience for Factor Form UX strategy
decisions.context: Michael has appetite to be key voice in experience strategy and has prior UX audit experience

feedback.feedback: Team is really solid and demonstrated strong community; example of Marina onboarding Shay shows good collaboration
Nikita is very happy with Katrina's work on TPT so far

blockers.issue: VMS Shopify store has templated design and lack of ownership
Factor Form has UX issues that need to be fixed
Previous designer constantly designed new components instead of reusing existing ones
Yuri level frustrations with team management
blockers.status: active - being addressed with more hands-on approach

key_topics: Hiring strategy for Good Chop designer replacement
Design system consistency and systematic work approach
Factor Form UX issues and strategy
Personal update on work-life balance (baby sleep)

decisions.context: Strategic decision to move faster to market, not due to resource constraints

decisions.what: Do not prioritize allowing customers to switch between influencers

decisions.what: Prioritize making customer journey as quick and close to one-click process as possible
decisions.context: Optimize conversion by removing operational friction like email/address input through express checkout and autofill
